A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Undoubtedly the worst Star Wars film ever made\, as well as the most disappointing film I've ever seen. The Last Jedi isn't only a terrible Star Wars film\, it's a bad movie overall and should be deleted from the franchise completely. I feel awful for Mark Hamill. He waited 34 years to play Luke in another franchise film and Rian Johnson made a mockery of his legacy. Rotten Tomatoes has revealed to us all that they will give any movie a good score if there's enough money involved and all the Top Critics on here that gave it a good score have lost all of my respect.
